alert.note: Alert for Grant; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cherry, northwestern Grant, northeastern Garden and southeastern Sheridan Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ellsworth, or 34 miles east of Alliance. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Finnegan Lake, Bingham, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake and Wild Horse Flats. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 117 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for the Panhandle of, north central and west central Nebraska.
